name: atp-micropayment-analyst
description: Sample ATP Micropayment Analyst demonstrating x402 monetized tools for IQAI's Agent Tokenization Platform

scripts.build: cd server && pnpm run build && cd ../agent && pnpm run build
scripts.start: concurrently "cd server && pnpm run start" "cd agent && pnpm run start"
scripts.postinstall: cd server && pnpm install && cd ../agent && pnpm install
scripts.lint: cd server && biome check . && cd ../agent && biome check .
scripts.lint:fix: cd server && biome check --write . && cd ../agent && biome check --write .
scripts.format: cd server && biome format --write . && cd ../agent && biome format --write .

author: IQAICOM
